DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether difference gene cod liver enzyme carboxylesterase 1 ( CES1 ) mean difference metabolism two CES1 dependent drug , enalapril methylphenidate .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolism Methylphenidate Enalapril Based CES1 Genotype
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old Caucasian Chronic disease ( except hay fever eczema ) Pregnancy Smoking High level alcohol consumption ( > 21 unit per week men 14 woman ) Known allergy towards methylphenidate enalapril Permanent use medication ( contraception ok )
